name: getTeams
description: Get a paginated list of all the Teams the authenticated User is a member of.

limit.description: Maximum number of Teams which may be returned.

since.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) to only include Teams created since then.

until.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) to only include Teams created until then.

$ul: **pagination**: This object contains information related to the pagination of the current request, including the necessary parameters to get the next or previous page of data.
**count**: Amount of items in the current page.
**next**: Timestamp that must be used to request the next page.
**prev**: Timestamp that must be used to request the previous page.
